content: winter s coming if you find yourself doubling up your leggings in the winter you re going to love this free beginner-friendly pattern by using a few basic stitches we ll create a pair of ribbed slouchy crochet leg warmers using one skein these leggings are made using single and double_crochet stitches and are worked in the round there are a few techniques you will need to know how to do but they re easy peasy and i have tutorials that will help you right along within the pattern you will find instructions on how to resize your leggings to fit you or anyone to perfection the materials needed are * 1 skein lion brand fishermans wool * 5mm crochet hook * tapestry needle please note that this is an ad-free beautifully formatted and concise pdf version of a pattern that can be found for free with ads on my blog to view the free version go to https //www sigonimacaroni com/slouchy-crochet-leg-warmers-beginner-friendly-pattern-one-skein/
